mapper.select: select r.role_id as roleId, r.role_code as roleCode, r.role_name as roleName from role r inner join user_role ur on r.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}

select DISTINCT p.permission_id as permissionId, p.permission_code as permissionCode, p.permission_name as permissionName from sys_user su left join user_role ur on su .user_id = ur.user_id left join role r on ur.role_id = r.role_id left join role_permission rp on r.role_id = rp.role_id left join permission p on rp.permission_id = p.permission_id where su.user_id = #{userId}
